content: this pattern is inspired by cutecatrock on tiktok and torti crafts on instagram the shape of the leaves was a noticeable adjustment that i made because i just adore the look of the crocodile stitch as scales and leaves you may use this pattern for personal use as well as and to sell just please reference me fb veraquin art ig/tt modern day mononoke supplies 5mm crochet hook 4mm crochet hook optional but it makes it easier yarn o caron simply soft- white o caron simply soft- woodland heather darning needle stitch markers recommended stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half-double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble triple crochet treble_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch magic_ring mc foundation half_double_crochet fhdc back loop only blo modified crocodile stitch- i ll explain this later on petals 6 total using 5mm crochet hook front and back petals make 2 row 1 chain 25 chain 1 and turn starting from the second chain from the hook 2 slip_stitch* 3 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 9 double_crochet 3hdc 3sc 2sl st* chain 1 and turn *i recommend inserting a marker in the first and last slip_stitch as it will be tight to work into and blends into the turning chain row 2 working down the other side of the chain repeat the stitches from row 1 chain 1 and turn row 3 repeat row 2 working in blo row 4 repeat row 2 working in blo center switch to 4mm crochet hook spine you should see small gaps down the center of your petal with the right side facing up insert your hook down through each gap and slip_stitch to the other end of the petal** fasten_off to desired length ** the number of slip_stitch is unimportant only for aesthetics and stability sizing note the red and blue font indicates the adjustments to the front and back petal to create each half of the hole which takes up 3 st the rest of the petal is worked up the exact same as front and back petal you can move the gap placement towards or away from the center of the flower to best fit your cat but keep in mind that top of the flower will be rounded and won t sit directly atop your cat s head left side earhole make 2 row 1 chain 25 chain 1 and turn starting from the second chain from the hook 2 slip_stitch 3 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into same stitch 4 slip_stitch chain 3 working into the same st as previous slip_stitch 6 double_crochet 3hdc 3sc 2sl st* chain 1 and turn 25 row 2 working down the other side of the chain 2 slip_stitch* 3 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 9 double_crochet 3hdc 3sc 2sl st* chain 1 and turn 25 row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 repeat row 2 center switch to 4mm crochet hook spine slip_stitch to other end fasten_off to desired length right side earhole make 2 row 1 chain 25 chain 1
